function.name: qtfm_helpup
function.short: Rebuild QTFM HTML help files from XML masters

long.para: qtfm_helpup processes the QTFM XML help files to produce the HTML files that are visible to the user in the &matlab; help window. There is no need for the user to run this function (although it does no harm) unless some of the XML files have been updated from the CVS repository.
